transcript: the more expensive it is the easier it is to sell cuz you're dealing with better people you probably had a Consulting client that pays you 50 Grand it's like oh yeah by the way I sent the wire yesterday whereas the $50 person like what exactly am I going to be getting with this program you know what I mean it's just it's a different person you know what I mean you're dealing with a different Avatar and from an actual selling perspective almost every sale is the same regardless so you might as well just do the sales that you're getting paid $5,000 for rather than sales you're getting $20 for learn how to sell and then find the most expensive thing you possibly can to sell
